hackathon-description-text: AlphaHacks (Nov. 25th, 2017; 860 Richmond St. W, 3rd floor) is Canada's first youth (secondary/post-secondary) financial technology (fintech) hackathon, bringing together coders, designers, fintech enthusiasts, and innovators at Wealthsimple's Office for a day of learning, competition, and overall fun. The purpose is to expose youth to the nature of rapid technological change that is materializing in the financial sector.
hackathon-requirements: The only requirement is that your hack/project should have some relevance or application to finance or fintech - that's it! Whether you create a wireframe UI, app, website - that's all up to you and your team!

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The grand prize is $150  ($30/each) worth of Amazon Gift Cards for this holiday season's spending spree! Wealthsimple swag (e.g. - shirts, bottles, etc.) will be provided as well.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: 1st Place Hack Prize: Amazon Gift Cards + Wealthsimple Swag

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Tickets to FintechTO, premier financial technology conference, worth $100-$150, given to second place winner(s). Wealthsimple swag will also be provided.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: 2nd Place Hack Prize: FintechTO Tickets + Wealthsimple Swag

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each third place winner will receive swag from Wealthsimple (e.g. - bottles, mugs, shirts, etc.).
A lucky raffle participant will be able to take home a nice set of Bose headphones, specifically favoured by Wealthsimple's very own engineers!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=860 Richmond St W, Toronto, ON M6J 1C9, Canada

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Teams will be judged based on three ten point (30 point total maximum score) metrics: technology, design, and pitch. Judges will write notes, provide category, and total scores.

hackathon-location-address: 860 Richmond St W, Toronto, ON M6J 1C9, Canada
hackathon-description-header: Create software for financial applications and purposes to gain exposure and learning to the expanding world of Fin-Tech!
